By using Lightning Release, the user surrounds themselves with electricity in the form of armour. The intense electric field enhances the user's speed,<ref>''Boruto'' episode 30</ref> and protects them by electrocuting anyone who makes contact with it. The armour appears very strong, as it's capable of withstanding [[Rock Lee]]'s [[Drunken Fist]].
